## Description {#details}

This file defines the RefCountedBase, ThreadSafeRefCountedBase, and IntrusiveRefCntPtr classes.

IntrusiveRefCntPtr is a smart pointer to an object which maintains a reference count. (ThreadSafe)RefCountedBase is a mixin class that adds a refcount member variable and methods for updating the refcount. An object that inherits from (ThreadSafe)RefCountedBase deletes itself when its refcount hits zero.

For example:


<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">MyClass : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RefCountedBase&lt;MyClass&gt; &#123;&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> foo() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Constructing an IntrusiveRefCntPtr increases the pointee&#39;s refcount</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by 1 (from 0 in this case).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  IntrusiveRefCntPtr&lt;MyClass&gt; Ptr1(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MyClass());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Copying an IntrusiveRefCntPtr increases the pointee&#39;s refcount by 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  IntrusiveRefCntPtr&lt;MyClass&gt; Ptr2(Ptr1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Constructing an IntrusiveRefCntPtr has no effect on the object&#39;s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// refcount.  After a move, the moved-from pointer is null.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  IntrusiveRefCntPtr&lt;MyClass&gt; Ptr3(std::move(Ptr1));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Ptr1 == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Clearing an IntrusiveRefCntPtr decreases the pointee&#39;s refcount by 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  Ptr2.reset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The object deletes itself when we return from the function, because</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ptr3&#39;s destructor decrements its refcount to 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>


You can use IntrusiveRefCntPtr with isa&lt;T&gt;(), dyn&#95;cast&lt;T&gt;(), etc.:


<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">IntrusiveRefCntPtr&lt;MyClass&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MyClass());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">OtherClass &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a5998c3d968454cd19d6c0ba8e5331a14a6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a> = dyn&#95;cast&lt;OtherClass&gt;(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>);  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ptr.get() not required</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>


IntrusiveRefCntPtr works with any class that


<ul>
<li>inherits from (ThreadSafe)RefCountedBase,</li>
<li>has <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga8bf6836a2bd83d4d7a9c8ac79d3da011">Retain()</a> and Release() methods, or</li>
<li>specializes IntrusiveRefCntPtrInfo.</li>
</ul>

<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Class you can specialize to provide custom retain/release functionality for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a type.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Usually specializing this class is not necessary, as IntrusiveRefCntPtr</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="comment">/// works with any type which defines Retain() and Release() functions -- you</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="comment">/// can define those functions yourself if RefCountedBase doesn&#39;t work for you.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">/// One case when you might want to specialize this type is if you have</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - Foo.h defines type Foo and includes Bar.h, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - Bar.h uses IntrusiveRefCntPtr&lt;Foo&gt; in inline functions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Because Foo.h includes Bar.h, Bar.h can&#39;t include Foo.h in order to pull in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the declaration of Foo.  Without the declaration of Foo, normally Bar.h</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="comment">/// wouldn&#39;t be able to use IntrusiveRefCntPtr&lt;Foo&gt;, which wants to call</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="comment">/// T::Retain and T::Release.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="comment">/// To resolve this, Bar.h could include a third header, FooFwd.h, which</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">/// forward-declares Foo and specializes IntrusiveRefCntPtrInfo&lt;Foo&gt;.  Then</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Bar.h could use IntrusiveRefCntPtr&lt;Foo&gt;, although it still couldn&#39;t call any</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">/// functions on Foo itself, because Foo would be an incomplete type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/intrusiverefcntptrinfo"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/intrusiverefcntptrinfo">IntrusiveRefCntPtrInfo</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/intrusiverefcntptrinfo/#a164f355991617c24c14e4d61cf2787da"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/intrusiverefcntptrinfo/#a164f355991617c24c14e4d61cf2787da">useCount</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;obj) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> obj-&gt;UseCount(); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/intrusiverefcntptrinfo/#a14558754209b6bf4d5d8eb4d43900681"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/intrusiverefcntptrinfo/#a14558754209b6bf4d5d8eb4d43900681">retain</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;obj) &#123; obj-&gt;Retain(); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/intrusiverefcntptrinfo/#acd7a88e0a43d734b6692c22e9d93e7f5"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/intrusiverefcntptrinfo/#acd7a88e0a43d734b6692c22e9d93e7f5">release</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;obj) &#123; obj-&gt;Release(); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A smart pointer to a reference-counted object that inherits from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">/// RefCountedBase or ThreadSafeRefCountedBase.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This class increments its pointee&#39;s reference count when it is created, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">/// decrements its refcount when it&#39;s destroyed (or is changed to point to a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="comment">/// different object).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrusiverefcntptr"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrusiverefcntptr/#a9a3f5687546d02323dd55333c4d4917c">IntrusiveRefCntPtr</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;Obj = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
